summary: Lightweight mod that fixes various titles of books, recipes, and notes, while still staying lore-friendly. Featured on GEMS. Now with DLC support!
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/mN0rn.png[/img][/center]

[size=5][center][b]Details[/b][/center][/size]

Organized Books is a lightweight mod I made when frustrated with the inconsistencies and improper sorting of the ingame books. I was also frustrated with not knowing whether I had all the books in a series or not. My mod fixes these issues, while staying as true to lore as possible. Nothing new was added; only names of vanilla books were edited. For example, the book title [i]The Wolf Queen, v4[/i] has been changed to [i]Wolf Queen, Vol. 4 of 8[/i]. Chapters of a book are also labeled as such; for example, [i]A Dance in Fire, v1[/i] is now [i]Dance in Fire, Ch. 1 of 7[/i].

Recipes, including Atronach Forge recipes, have also been renamed; since it was nigh impossible to distinguish a shopkeeper's recipe from your own without buying it, I assigned each version of a certain recipe a number for easy distinction.

I also removed any articles from the beginnings of titles, unless it modified the meaning of the title itself. For example, [i]The Lusty Argonian Maid, v1[/i] is now [i]Lusty Argonian Maid, Vol. 1 of 2[/i]. and [i]The Legend of Red Eagle[/i] is now [i]Legend of Red Eagle[/i]. Any articles or prepositions within the body of the title have been made lower case as well.

I have plans to scrub each and every book of any inconsistencies, spelling errors, grammar errors, and lore errors; this will take a while, so please be patient. If you have any questions or concerns, feel free to message me or add me on Steam (same nick). Thanks!

[size=5][center][b]Installation[/b][/center][/size]

If using the Nexus Mod Manager or another mod manager, simply click 'Download with Manager' and activate the plugin from there. If installing manually:

1. Extract the files to a temporary location.
2. Copy files to C:Program Files/Steam/steamapps/common/Skyrim/Data
3. Start Skyrim Launcher, click 'Data Files', place a checkmark beside the .esp file(s).
4. ???
5. Profit!

To uninstall, just deactivate the mod within NMM or delete the associated files.

[size=5][center][b]Incompatibility[/b][/center][/size]

[center][size=3][color=green][b]For those using Non-Automatic Skill Books, please use the patch located under Optional Files here:[/b]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/16463]NASB Compatibility Patch[/url][/color][/size][/center]

Unfortunately, this mod is incompatible with any mods that edit the vanilla book titles in any way. If you use a better sorting mod, just don't use the book sorting option listed, and the mods should work together. Currently working on adding support for other popular book mods.

[size=5][center][b]Known Issues or Bugs[/b][/center][/size]

- May break fetch quests involving books. Currently working on a solution.
- Incompatible with Book Covers Skyrim. Working on a compatability patch.

[size=5][center][b]Changelog[/b][/center][/size]

2.0, 2014/01/08 - Added support for Dragonborn. Differentiated between chapters and volumes. Sorts journals, notes, and letters by default now. (Note: Currently requires all official DLC to work properly.)
1.2, 2012/12/18 - Cleaned with TES5Edit.
1.1, 2012/11/20 - Added support for Dawnguard and Hearthfire books, and sorted journals, notes, and letters.
1.0, 2012/11/15 - Cleaned up mod, fixed any remaining vanilla book titles, and fixed inconsistent recipes, spell tomes, and treasure maps.
0.1, 2012/11/14 - Alpha release.

[size=5][center][b]Contact[/b][/center][/size]

You can find me on the Nexus and Steam as 'gsmc'. Thanks!

[size=5][center][b]Credits[/b][/center][/size]

Headbomb - Inspiration
eclips3 - Inspiration
Myrrlyn - Tons of help. Can't thank him enough.
/r/teslore - Help with lore issues.
Nexus - For hosting my mod.
LHammonds - Readme Generator
Bethesda - Making Skyrim

[size=5][center][b]Licensing/Legal[/b][/center][/size]

You must contact me and obtain my permission before re-packaging any part of
this mod. If I do not respond within 2 weeks, feel free to do whatever you
like with this mod.

[center][url=http://www.skyrimgems.com][img]http://i.imgur.com/1wXSO.png[/img][/url][/center]
author: gsmc
